trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML-friendly implementation of a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter"></xref> that filters on a single action.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
The action for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.

Determines whether the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.

`true` if the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Returns the hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.
The hash code for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref> instance.

Determines whether the specified message’s action matches the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action"></xref> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
The message to compare.
`true` if the action matches; otherwise, `false`.

Determines whether the action of the message contained by the specified message buffer matches the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action"></xref> of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
The message buffer that contains the message to compare.
`true` if the action matches; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a <xref href="System.String"></xref> representation of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.

If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> property is set, its value is used to build the string representation; otherwise, the base class <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> value is returned.
The current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter"></xref>.
